Title: Red
Writer: Jay Abello (story), Jay Abello (screenplay), Dwight Gaston (screenplay)
Actors: Jericho Rosales, Mercedes Cabral, Nico Antonio, JM Rodriguez
Plot: Red, a legendary fixer in the underground world of Visayas, is called to patch things up-but he soon finds himself framed for the very thing he was asked to repair, forced into decisions that put his life at stake.
